articles.author: Luke Thrower
articles.title: Kai Havertz to Arsenal transfer agreement 'close' as Chelsea prepare response to new bid - Football.London
articles.description: Chelsea star Kai Havertz looks set to make the move to Arsenal this summer in a huge transfer switch
articles.content: Arsenal are nearing an agreement to sign Chelsea star Kai Havertz in a huge deal this summer transfer window, if recent reports are to be believed. The 24-year-old looks set to leave the Blues after … [+2143 chars]
